amendment.description: To increase funding to facilitate reconstruction in Haiti.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2715 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2715 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2676-2677; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2676) To increase funding to facilitate reconstruction in Haiti.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2715 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2715 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator DeWine.
